H0.text: Which sport uses the terms ‘plastron’ ‘piste’ and ‘riposte’. Fencer

H1.text: Which sport uses the terms ‘plastron’ ‘piste’ and ‘riposte’. Martial Artist

H2.text: Which sport uses the terms ‘plastron’ ‘piste’ and ‘riposte’. Swordsman

H3.text: Which sport uses the terms ‘plastron’ ‘piste’ and ‘riposte’. Épéeist

A4.text: Fencing is a combat sport that features sword fighting.

A5.text: Riposte: An attack by the defender after a successful parry.
